com.threerings.media

Interface MediaConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMediaManager, AnimationManager, MediaPanel, MetaMediaManager, MisoScenePanel, SpriteManager, VirtualMediaPanel

    public interface MediaConstants
    Constants specific to the media package.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALL
      Identifies the all "layers" of sprites and animations.
      static int BACK
      Identifies the back "layer" of sprites and animations.
      static int FRONT
      Identifies the front "layer" of sprites and animations.

    • Field Detail

        Identifies the back "layer" of sprites and animations.

        Identifies the front "layer" of sprites and animations.
